alert.note: Alert for Grand (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 18 at 6:04PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Arroyo and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of east central Utah, including the vicinity of Green River UT and areas southeast of town in Grand County. * WHEN...Until 900 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 559 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause arroyo and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of West Central Grand County mostly along and south of I-70 near Green River UT. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
